title: Download lol
body: my lol patcher says i need to download a 14 GB file and i have 1 mb/s download speed so. if any one could upload the lol file for me on any download site so i could download the file without the patcher's problems.

replies.body: Downloading or transferring from another source wouldn't work.  It would cause your patcher to rescan all of your files and download them temporarily, every time you open it.  Is the download speed a sudden issue or just the result of your ISP plan?
result of ISP plan. lots of people on lol boards moved lol files to another computer and it worked fine so i need to download it with pause option because the patcher makes me sick
